faq-questions-answers.question: What happens when I update my email address (or mobile number)?
faq-questions-answers.answer: Your login email id (or mobile number) changes, likewise. You'll receive all your account related communication on your updated email address (or mobile number).

faq-questions-answers.question: When will my NThreads account be updated with the new email address (or mobile number)?
faq-questions-answers.answer: It happens as soon as you confirm the verification code sent to your email (or mobile) and save the changes.

faq-questions-answers.question: What happens to my existing NThreads account when I update my email address (or mobile number)?
faq-questions-answers.answer: Updating your email address (or mobile number) doesn't invalidate your account. Your account remains fully functional. You'll continue seeing your Order history, saved information and personal details.

faq-questions-answers.question: Does my Seller account get affected when I update my email address?
faq-questions-answers.answer: NThreads has a 'single sign-on' policy. Any changes will reflect in your Seller account also.
